LanguageData.VFEP_Camaraderie_Respected.label: шановний
LanguageData.VFEP_Camaraderie_Respected.description:
Different interests, yet aiming for one: hardships, suffering and sacrifices must be faced together, as a crew.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colonists will receive a +3 mood bonus after socializing with another colonist.
LanguageData.VFEP_Camaraderie_Exalted.label: піднесений
LanguageData.VFEP_Camaraderie_Exalted.description:
In the table of brotherhood we'll dine, the banner of camaraderie will be unroll, all for one, one for all. Together, we will have the world.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colonists will receive a +6 mood bonus after socializing with another colonist.
LanguageData.VFEP_Camaraderie_Exalted.comps.1.thought: Been through some tough times together! (cumulative +5 per slain colonist)
LanguageData.VFEP_SingingShanties.label: співак шанті
LanguageData.VFEP_SingingShanties.description: Colonists gather around a campfire and sing shanties to strengthen their camaraderie.
LanguageData.VFEP_IdeoRole_Captain.label: капітан
LanguageData.VFEP_IdeoRole_Captain.description: Generally chosen for his daring and dominating character, a pirate captain is often admired for his cruelty and destructiveness.
